column3: Distribute a single value to the histogram
Distribute an index of values to the histogram
Describes the current state of the histogram
Produces a stochastic vector of *unspecified* length
Produces a stochastic vector of a specified length
Produces a stochastic vector of a natural length
Allocates and populates a right-stochastic matrix, otherwise known as a Markov matrix;            each row records a stocastic vector
Constructs a Bernouli distribution given a specification and random source
